casebody.data:
Anthony DOVE
v.
Debra SPELLER. No. 511P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. David J. Fillippeli, Jr., Kinston, for Debra Speller.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of July 2005 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Discretionary Review Pursuant to N.C.G.S. 7A-31(c)(1) and (2)":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
